author: wn.com
title: Rebar quoted in BDN article on E. coli related to agritourism (University of Maine)
text: ( Source : University of Maine ) John Rebar, executive director of the University of Maine Cooperative Extension , spoke with the Bangor Daily News for the article, ' E. coli infections highlight concerns for Maine farmers in agritourism.' State
